table.name: IGN - Base Timing
table.description: "This is a map of base ignition values."

table.name: FUEL - Low Detonation
table.description: "Low detonation fuel map, used when IAM is greater than 4."

table.name: FUEL - High Detonation
table.description: "High detonation fuel map, used when IAM is 4 or less."

table.name: EGT Limit
table.description: "Maximum allowed Exhaust Gas Temperature limit before Check Engine Light."

table.name: Rev Limit
table.description: "RPM at which limiter turns on and off."

table.name: Rev Limit - IGN Retard
table.description: "Degrees of Ignition to Retard when hitting the limiter"

table.name: Boost Speed Limiting
table.description: "Speed at which boost is reduced to wastegate pressure."

table.name: Injector Pulse Width
table.description: "Injector opening time compensation due to Battery Voltage."

table.name: CEL - MAF Threshold
table.description: "Voltage at which a CEL will throw due to MAF voltage"

table.name: Boost Limit (CEL) ?
table.description: "Max boost before Check Engine Light, per gear?"

table.name: AM - Fuel Map Switch Threshold
table.description: "Advance Multiplier 4 or below will switch Fuel to High Det"

table.name: CL Min Coolant Temp
table.description: "Minimum coolant temp for closed loop fueling."

table.name: CL Max EGT
table.description: "Maximum exhaust gas temperature for closed loop fueling."

table.name: CL Max EGT - High Det
table.description: "Maximum exhaust gas temperature for closed loop fueling. High Det"

table.name: CL Max MPH Trigger
table.description: "Max MPH for CL Set to match RPM with MPH"

table.name: IDLE - Min Speed HiAmp (AT)
table.description: "Startup IDLE Speed Minimum during High Amps"

table.name: IDLE - Min Speed HiAmp (MT)
table.description: "Startup IDLE Speed Minimum during High Amps"
